name: Verify Camera Boundary Limits with Visual and Audio Feedback
description: Validates that camera movement stops at boundaries with red line indicator and sound effect.
testObjective: Ensure camera boundaries are enforced with clear visual and audio feedback.
author: Dominic Brooks
preconditions: Player can move camera using WASD

steps.action: Hold [W] to move camera upward until boundary is reached
steps.expected: Camera stops moving when boundary limit is reached
Red line appears as visual indicator of boundary
Sound effect plays to signal boundary has been reached
Each direction has boundary with same red line and sound effect

steps.action: Continue holding movement key at boundary
steps.expected: Camera remains at boundary, does not move beyond limit
Red line disappears, normal camera movement resumes

postconditions: Visual and audio feedback work correctly
